character.name: Gus
character.visual_prompt: A small gecko with a round head, big curious eyes, stubby legs, and a distinctive CURLY SPIRAL TAIL. Body is solid orange, belly is yellow. Bold black outlines. Simple cartoon style.

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Gus the orange gecko standing heroically in front of a large volcano. Gus has a distinctive CURLY SPIRAL TAIL. Volcano has orange lava glow at top. Bold dramatic sky. Expression: excited, eyes wide with wonder.
pages.riso_notes: Gus in ORANGE, volcano outline in BLACK, lava glow in ORANGE, sky highlights in YELLOW

pages.text: Gus sat on a big rock.
pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Gus the orange gecko sitting contentedly on a large gray rock. Curly spiral tail visible. Looking at distant volcano with curiosity. Expression: peaceful, slight smile, eyes looking toward horizon. Minimal background - solid color sky.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE, rock BLACK outline, sky YELLOW

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Gus pointing excitedly at a large volcano in the distance. Curly spiral tail perked up with interest. Expression: curious, eyes wide, mouth slightly open. Simple landscape - just the hill shape against sky.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE, volcano BLACK silhouette, sky YELLOW gradient

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Gus with determined, excited expression. Fist raised in the air. Curly spiral tail bouncing. Eyes sparkling with adventure. Solid color background. This is a catchphrase moment - BIG expression!
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE on solid YELLOW background

pages.image_prompt: DYNAMIC/ACTION SHOT: Gus running up the grassy hillside, legs in motion. Curly spiral tail streaming behind. Expression: joyful, mouth wide open in happy run. Motion lines. Simple green hill, blue sky.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE, motion lines BLACK, hill BLACK outline

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Gus climbing higher up the steep volcano slope. Getting smaller as he climbs. Curly spiral tail visible. Steam wisps at the top. Expression: determined, focused. Dramatic angle looking up.
pages.riso_notes: Gus small ORANGE figure, volcano BLACK, steam wisps YELLOW

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Gus standing proudly at the crater rim, looking down into the volcano. Curly spiral tail curled with excitement. Expression: amazed, eyes HUGE, jaw dropped. Orange glow from below illuminating face.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE, rim BLACK, glow from below ORANGE and YELLOW

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Inside the crater - bubbling, glowing lava! Dramatic orange and yellow pools. Steam rising. This is the PAGE TURN REVEAL - maximum visual impact. No character, just the lava spectacle.
pages.riso_notes: Lava ORANGE, highlights YELLOW, crater rim BLACK

pages.image_prompt: EXTREME CLOSE-UP: Gus's face filling the frame. MAXIMUM expression - eyes popping out of head with amazement, mouth wide open in awe. Orange glow reflecting on face. This is THE catchphrase moment!
pages.riso_notes: Gus face ORANGE, glow effect YELLOW, eyes knocked out to WHITE

pages.image_prompt: DYNAMIC SHOT: Volcano erupting! Rocks and steam shooting up. Gus in corner looking startled. Curly spiral tail standing straight with alarm. Expression: surprised, eyes wide, stepping back. Action and motion!
pages.riso_notes: Explosion ORANGE and YELLOW, rocks BLACK, Gus small ORANGE

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Gus feeling the heat - sweat drops, fanning himself with tiny hand. Curly spiral tail drooping. Lava rising behind him. Expression: worried, eyes squinting from heat, tongue out.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE, sweat drops YELLOW, lava ORANGE, heat waves BLACK lines

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Gus with urgent expression, pointing downhill. Curly spiral tail alert. Eyes determined, mouth shouting. Solid orange/yellow background suggesting danger. Decision moment!
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE on hot YELLOW/ORANGE background

pages.image_prompt: DYNAMIC/ACTION SHOT: Gus running full speed down the volcano. Curly spiral tail streaming. Lava flowing behind. Maximum motion - dust clouds, speed lines. Expression: focused determination.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE, motion lines BLACK, lava ORANGE, dust YELLOW

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Gus still running, looking back at the lava with a confident smirk. Curly spiral tail bouncing. This is the Pete the Cat resilience moment - he's got this! Expression: determined smile.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE, lava behind ORANGE, ground BLACK

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Final sprint! Gus almost at the bottom, safe ground visible. Volcano erupting dramatically behind. Curly spiral tail flying. Expression: relief starting to show, almost there!
pages.riso_notes: Gus small ORANGE, volcano BLACK with ORANGE eruption, safe ground BLACK

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Gus collapsed happily on his original rock, panting but smiling. Curly spiral tail relaxed and curled. Volcano smoking peacefully in background. Expression: exhausted but happy, big relieved smile.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE on BLACK rock, volcano distant BLACK, sky YELLOW

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Gus looking at viewer with knowing smile, catchphrase callback. Curly spiral tail making a heart shape. Expression: proud, satisfied, eyes twinkling. He did it! Warm sunset colors behind.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE, sunset glow YELLOW, warm feeling

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Gus waving goodbye from his rock, volcano peaceful in background with sunset. Curly spiral tail waving too. Expression: content, friendly wave to reader. Warm, cozy ending feeling.
pages.riso_notes: Gus ORANGE, sunset YELLOW, volcano BLACK silhouette
